items.summary: Create admin panel page that displays all users in a table with their current payment status (paid/unpaid) and provides toggle switches to change each user's payment status between paid and unpaid

Implement authentication gate that blocks unpaid users from logging in and displays error message: 'must pay in full to receive each month (31 days) sign in ability and access to the app. Each payment of $1.00 via Zelle earns a user one more month or 31 more days "paid" sign in ability and full access to the app and its features'

Add landing page message displaying payment instructions: 'please add all contact card info or contact card itself in your description of the Zelle payment(s) you send to the following individual (Matt Rossin) at Zelle phone number 3527348440'

Add contact information message to landing page: 'If you have any issues contact the admin Matt @thenewbruce1 on Instagram or via Txt or FaceTime at the ðŸ“² iPhone number 3527348440. My email is thenewbruce1@gmail.com or mattarmor1111@gmail.com but is rarely checked.'
Store and display admin principal ID (i67ts-e55ut-cg7iv-w4qa6-f63qo-pgevo-7zqec-cevgk-5nm7d-xjryz-mae) in backend for access control and admin identification
Create Contact Card page where users can enter and display their real name, NFL Combine Tracker username (display name), and any contact information they wish to share
Create New Entry page allowing users to input NFL Combine statistics for all standard combine drills with notes field for additional context
Implement basic LeaderBoard page that displays all users ranked by their combine performance with ranking from #1 to lowest, showing key performance metrics for each user
